Uses of Class
edu.rit.pj2.TaskSpec

  • Packages that use TaskSpec 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.pj2
    Package edu.rit.pj2 contains Parallel Java 2 (PJ2), an API and middleware for parallel programming in 100% Java on multicore parallel computers, cluster parallel computers, supercomputing grids, and cloud computing services.

    • Uses of TaskSpec in edu.rit.pj2

      Methods in edu.rit.pj2 that return TaskSpec 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TaskSpec TaskSpec.args(String... args)
      Specify the task's command line arguments.
      TaskSpec TaskSpec.chunk(int chunk)
      Specify the task's chunk property.
      TaskSpec TaskSpec.cores(int cores)
      Specify the task's cores property.
      TaskSpec TaskSpec.debug(Debug... debug)
      Print the given debugging messages for the task.
      TaskSpec TaskSpec.debug(Set<Debug> debug)
      Print the given debugging messages for the task.
      TaskSpec TaskSpec.gpus(int gpus)
      Specify the task's gpus property.
      TaskSpec TaskSpec.jvmFlags(String... jvmFlags)
      Specify the JVM flags for the task.
      <T extends Task> 
      TaskSpec      		 Job.masterFor(int lb, int ub, Class<T> taskClass)
      Add a master-worker cluster parallel for loop to this job, with a loop index of type int.
      <T extends Task> 
      TaskSpec      		 Job.masterFor(long lb, long ub, Class<T> taskClass)
      Add a master-worker cluster parallel for loop to this job, with a loop index of type long.
      TaskSpec TaskSpec.nodeName(String nodeName)
      Specify the task's nodeName property.
      TaskSpec TaskSpec.runInJobProcess()
      Specify that the task must run in the job's process.
      TaskSpec TaskSpec.schedule(Schedule schedule)
      Specify the task's schedule property.
      <T extends Task> 
      TaskSpec      		 Rule.task(Class<T> taskClass)
      Add the given task to this rule's task group.
      <T extends Task> 
      TaskSpec      		 TaskSpec.task(Class<T> taskClass)
      Add the given task to this task specification's rule's task group.
      <T extends Task> 
      TaskSpec      		 Rule.task(int copies, Class<T> taskClass)
      Add the given number of copies of the given task to this rule's task group.
      <T extends Task> 
      TaskSpec      		 TaskSpec.task(int n, Class<T> taskClass)
      Add the given number of copies of the given task to this task specification's rule's task group.
      TaskSpec TaskSpec.threads(int threads)
      Specify the task's threads property.
